梳梳RS㧧疏𣐌𣓜𣙳𤴜 comb, brush
  • wooden 木 implement used to comb uncultivated 㐬 hair
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 㐬 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
梳理 [ shū lǐ ]: to comb; fig. to sort out
梳头 [ shū tóu ]: to comb one's hair
梳洗 [ shū xǐ ]: to make oneself presentable; to freshen up
梳妆 [ shū zhuāng ]: to dress and groom oneself
梳妆台 [ shū zhuāng tái ]: dressing table

heisig_chinese_memo: Baby moses gets his soft hair combed by a wooden brush made from a special tree.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you use the tree (木) in the private lidded river (㐬) for a comb
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Baby moses gets his soft hair combed by a wooden brush made from a special tree.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood ", " sparse " to save sound. The original meaning is comb. "Shuowen": "Comb, haircut." The paragraph note was changed to "Suowei haircut." "Release name. "Shi Jewelry": "Comb, talk about its teeth and Tong Ye." For example, Du Mu of the Tang Dynasty "Zhang Haohao Poem": "The gift of Tianma brocade, the assistant uses water rhinoceros comb." "Old Tang Book. "The Book of Wenzong": "Ding Si, the hit envoy princess Hanyang and the princesses proclaimed the decree: In the future, when encountering the opposite day, no hairpins or short and narrow clothes are required."

" Comb " also means using a comb to cut hair. Duan Yucai, "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "The device is called comb, and the haircut used is also called comb. The body of the word is the same." Such as "Ancient Lie Nv Biography." Ren Zhi Chuan. "Lu Zang's grandmother": "Those with insufficient crowns and surpluses will not be able to comb their heads or be hungry." "Xian Yuan": "It is when Li combs his hair, the hair committee borrows the land, the complexion is jade, not moving."

" Comb " also means unblocking and unblocking. For example, Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Preface to the Book of Zheng Shang": "The bees are mixed with ants, and they cannot be crawled and combed." Zhu Zi6. "On Choosing Scholars": "Someone said that things in the world don't start from it. You have to get the knots and then sort them down from the top to see the order."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood ", " sparse " to save the sound. The original meaning is comb, and it means to use comb to cut hair.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「疏」省聲。本義是梳子。《說文》：「梳，理髮也。」段注改為「所㠯理髮也」。《釋名．釋首飾》：「梳，言其齒䟽也。」如唐代杜牧〈張好好詩〉：「贈之天馬錦，副以水犀梳。」《舊唐書．文宗本紀》：「丁巳，命中使於漢陽公主及諸公主第宣旨：今後每遇對日，不得廣插釵梳，不須著短窄衣服。」

　　「梳」又表示用梳子理髮。段玉裁《說文解字注》：「器曰梳，用之理髮因亦曰梳。凡字之體用同稱如此。」如《古列女傳．仁智傳．魯臧孫母》：「冠纓不足帶有餘者，頭亂不得梳，飢不得食也。」《世說新語．賢媛》：「正值李梳頭，髮委藉地，膚色玉曜，不為動容。」

　　「梳」也表示疏理、疏導。如唐代韓愈〈送鄭尚書序〉：「蜂屯蟻雜，不可爬梳。」《朱子語類．朱子六．論取士》：「某嘗謂，天下事不是從中做起，須得結子頭是當，然後從上梳理下來，方見次序。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「疏」省聲。本義是梳子，又表示用梳子理髮。

從「 木 」，「 疏 」省聲。本義是梳子。《說文》：「梳，理髮也。」段注改為「所㠯理髮也」。《釋名．釋首飾》：「梳，言其齒䟽也。」如唐代杜牧〈張好好詩〉：「贈之天馬錦，副以水犀梳。」《舊唐書．文宗本紀》：「丁巳，命中使於漢陽公主及諸公主第宣旨：今後每遇對日，不得廣插釵梳，不須著短窄衣服。」 「 梳 」又表示用梳子理髮。段玉裁《說文解字注》：「器曰梳，用之理髮因亦曰梳。凡字之體用同稱如此。」如《古列女傳．仁智傳．魯臧孫母》：「冠纓不足帶有餘者，頭亂不得梳，飢不得食也。」《世說新語．賢媛》：「正值李梳頭，髮委藉地，膚色玉曜，不為動容。」 「 梳 」也表示疏理、疏導。如唐代韓愈〈送鄭尚書序〉：「蜂屯蟻雜，不可爬梳。」《朱子語類．朱子六．論取士》：「某嘗謂，天下事不是從中做起，須得結子頭是當，然後從上梳理下來，方見次序。」

"Old Tang Book. "The Book of Wenzong": "Ding Si, the hit envoy princess Hanyang and the princesses proclaimed the decree: In the future, when encountering the opposite day, no hairpins or short and narrow clothes are required." " Comb" also means using a comb to cut hair. Duan Yucai, "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "The device is called comb, and the haircut used is also called comb. The body of the word is the same." 梳字的基本解释

梳
shū
整理头发的用具：木梳。角梳。
用梳子整理头发：梳头。梳洗（梳头洗脸）。梳妆。梳辫子（喻把纷繁的事项、问题等进行分析归类）。

梳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》所葅切，平魚，生。］
(1)梳子。整理须发的用具。
(2)指梳状的工具。
(3)以梳理发。
(4)整理；疏导。
(5)分割开。
(6)梳拢。

梳字的英文翻译

◎ 梳
comb, ripple

梳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梳； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页531第07
【唐韻】所菹切【集韻】【韻會】山於切【正韻】山徂切，?音疏。【說文】理髮也。【徐曰】梳之言導也。【揚雄·長楊賦】頭蓬不暇梳。《文選》作梳，《漢書》作疏。　又【博雅】經梳謂之枃。【廣韻】櫛也。【釋名】梳，言其齒疏也。【唐書·吳兢傳】朝有諷諫，猶髮之有梳。　【集韻】或作?、?。　又【古音轉註】設竹切，音束。妝梳也。【劉禹錫·歷陽書事詩】容顏本南國，妝梳學西京。

梳字的源字形

梳字的起名意思

梳子。

(2) Refers to a comb-shaped tool.
(3) Haircut with comb.
(4) Organize; unblock.
(5) Split.
(6) Combing.
